summary: This New York Post article discusses various high-profile individuals and events, including Jeffrey Epstein's potential interest in acquiring IMG Models and his past dealings with modeling agencies. It also touches on political controversies involving Bronx politicians and other celebrity news. This document appears to be a page from a New York Post article discussing various celebrities and events, including Shaquille O'Neal's dining habits, Paris Hilton's controversial advertisement, and other social happenings. It does not contain any direct references to the Epstein case or related individuals.
